doc.title: DuckTales
doc.plot: In five locations around the planet, except one being the moon, are hidden five valuable treasures worth millions, maybe even billions, trillions, or quadrazillions. And the richest duck in the world, Scrooge McDuck, wants them all. The locations are: the Amazon, Transylvania, African Mine, Himalayas, and the Moon. Scrooge must use his cane to help him out of tight spots and to beat off villains like the Beagle Boys, Magica and others and must race Flintheart Glomgold to the treasure.
